title: Is this  a Morde glitch?
body:
the dragon isn't bind to you... you can send him bot in order to push and back/or siege mid with your team.

Is this intended or CertainlyT forgot to finish his work?????????????

replies.body: Yes this basically becomes Morde's split push. Its awesome!!! 5 v 5 while he takes down a tower.

Intended.  Can you imagine how OP it would be to have that thing hide at the end of your range and use the rubber band effect to ambush anyone that thought they found you alone?
It has a very long leash.
